code: import React from'react';import Header from'../../components/header/Header';import Footer from'../../components/footer/Footer';import Component from'./Component';import'./blog.css';import{Helmet}from'react-helmet';import Fade from'react-reveal/Fade';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Blog(){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Helmet,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("title",{children:"Blog | Lenka Design"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Header,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("main",{className:"max-width",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Fade,{bottom:true,cascade:true,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Blog"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"blog",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Component,{file:"word/eshopy.pdf",title:"Eshopy",text:"B\u011Bhem Covid restrikc\xED se trend nakupov\xE1n\xED n\xE1bytku a dekorac\xED p\u0159es e-shopy stal b\u011B\u017En\xFDm, proto\u017Ee k za\u0159\xEDzen\xED \u010Di vylep\u0161en\xED interi\xE9ru z\xE1kazn\xEDk\u016Fm nic jin\xE9ho nezb\xFDvalo. Tento trend bude je\u0161t\u011B ale asi chv\xEDli p\u0159etrv\xE1vat.  Zde najdete tipy  o tom, jak a kde nakupovat na e-shopech, na co si d\xE1t pozor a jak nenalet\u011Bt!",image:"img/blog/blog_eshopy.jpg"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Component,{file:"word/home_office.pdf",title:"Home office",text:"Pr\xE1ce z domu  pat\u0159\xED v t\xE9to dob\u011B mezi nejdiskutovan\u011Bj\u0161\xED t\xE9ma. Sama proto r\xE1da p\u0159isp\u011Bji ze sv\xE9 vlastn\xED skoro 10let\xE9 zku\u0161enosti a k tomu p\u0159id\xE1m p\xE1r tip\u016F na zamy\u0161len\xED a p\u0159\xEDpadnou realizaci. Tipy na jednoduch\xE9 za\u0159\xEDzen\xED cel\xE9 dom\xE1c\xED pracovny a na co nezapomenout\u2026",image:"img/blog/blog_home_office.jpg"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Component,{file:"word/jaro_v_interieru.pdf",title:"Jaro v interi\xE9ru",text:"M\u011Bli bychom vpustit jaro i do na\u0161ich domov\u016F, aby n\xE1m p\u0159ineslo radost a sv\u011B\u017Eest.  N\xE1\u0161 interi\xE9r m\u016F\u017Eeme rozjasnit nejen nov\xFDmi barvami, ale i p\xE1r kousky nov\xE9ho n\xE1bytku \u010Di jen dekoracemi a kv\u011Btinami.",image:"img/blog/blog_jaro_v_interieru.jpg"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Component,{file:"word/rolety_den_a_noc.pdf",title:"Rolety Den a noc jako funk\u010Dn\xED designov\xFD prvek",text:"Rolety den a noc jsou jist\u011B funk\u010Dn\xEDm \u0159e\u0161en\xEDm zast\xEDn\u011Bn\xED m\xEDstnost\xED. Ale nemaj\xED pouze praktickou \xFAlohu. Samoz\u0159ejm\u011B, \u017Ee je m\u016F\u017Eete vyu\u017E\xEDt jako designov\xFD prvek a dokreslit a sladit celou m\xEDstnost. Skl\xE1daj\xED se z jednotliv\xFDch \u201Elamel\u201C l\xE1tky a s\xED\u0165ky dle Va\u0161eho v\xFDb\u011Bru. Stejn\u011B jako u \u017Ealuzi\xED, i u rolet den a noc se m\u016F\u017Eete rozhodnout pro vyta\u017Een\xED cel\xE9 l\xE1tky nahoru a t\xEDm okno zcela odkr\xFDt, p\u0159\xEDpadn\u011B sta\u017Een\xED a\u017E dol\u016F a okno zakr\xFDt.",image:"img/blog/rolety_den_a_noc.jpg"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Component,{file:"word/vstupni_prostory.pdf",title:"Nepodce\u0148ujte vstupn\xED prostory!",text:"Vstupn\xED prostor je vlastn\u011B to prvn\xED do \u010Deho \u010Dlov\u011Bk vstoup\xED, co spat\u0159\xED a tak\xE9 jako posledn\xED z n\u011Bho odch\xE1z\xED. Je to prostor, kter\xFD n\xE1s v\xEDt\xE1, p\u016Fsob\xED na n\xE1s, navod\xED atmosf\xE9ru, dod\xE1 n\xE1ladu a pohodu domova a je vizitkou pro n\xE1v\u0161t\u011Bvy.",image:"img/blog/blog_vstupni_prostory.jpg"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Component,{file:"word/vylepseni_detskeho_pokoje.pdf",title:"Vylep\u0161en\xED d\u011Btsk\xE9ho pokoje",text:"Zkuste ud\u011Blat zm\u011Bnu a ze\u010F \u010Di \u010D\xE1st zdi nat\u0159\xEDt \u010Dernou tabulovou barvou. Dal\u0161\xED mo\u017Enost je magnetick\xE1 barva, kter\xE1 nemus\xED z\u016Fstat \u010Dern\xE1.. Tak\xE9 jsou \u010Dast\xE9 samolepic\xED tabulov\xE9 tapety, kter\xE9 lze om\xFDt vodou a je zde i rychl\xE1 instalace. Hezk\xE9 jemn\xE9 tapety pokoj\xEDk z\xFAtuln\xED. Korkov\xE9 zdi tlum\xED zvuk a slou\u017E\xED tak\xE9 jako n\xE1st\u011Bnky.",image:"img/blog/blog_detske_pokoje.jpg"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Component,{file:"word/koupelny.pdf",title:"Nov\xE9 styly koupelen",text:"Chcete si po\u0159\xEDdit novou koupelnu a nev\xEDte pro jak\xFD typ se rozhodnout?  Mezi nejnov\u011Bj\u0161\xED trendy pat\u0159\xED plastick\xE9 3D OBKLADY\u2026 Nad\u010Dasov\xFD vzhled vytvo\u0159\xEDte tak\xE9 z keramick\xFDch obklad\u016F s P\u0158\xCDRODN\xCDM DEKOREM\u2026 Do podv\u011Bdom\xED se nyn\xED dost\xE1vaj\xED celoplo\u0161n\xE9, om\xFDvateln\xE9 a vod\u011B-odoln\xE9 TAPETY. ",image:"img/blog/blog_koupelny.jpg"})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Footer,{})]});}export default Blog;

import React from 'react' import Header from '../../components/header/Header' import Footer from '../../components/footer/Footer' import Component from './Component' import './blog.css' import { Helmet } from 'react-helmet'; import Fade from 'react-reveal/Fade'; function Blog() { return ( <> Blog | Lenka Design

Blog
) } export default Blog
